name: Trials of The Pharaoh
description:
Made in 10 Days for GDTV Jam 2022

An Egyptian Themed Light Ray puzzle game.

You wake up in a tomb, a female pharaoh without a name. Anubis forbids your passage into the next life, unless you can recover your memories. You must complete a series of trails to get your name into the book of the dead.

Team:

Mick Cooke - MakeFire Music   -> Music

 https://youtube.com/channel/UCs75GjfGdtTS-CekMJOGICA
